short_summary: Installation, Repairs, and Maintenance of Building Automation Systems
description: Reissue of Request for Standing Offers for services to the Department of National Defence for building automation systems (BAS) installation, repairs, and maintenance.
full_summary:
### Building Automation Systems Installation, Repairs, and Maintenance Services ##

#### Solicitation Details ##

* **Solicitation Title**: Installation, Repairs, and Maintenance of Building Automation Systems
* **Reference Number**: WS3989946810-Doc4117423995
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Publication Date**: July 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 11, 2023, 02:00 PM EDT

#### Tender Status and Request for Standing Offers ##

This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number W6896-23S085/A dated June 13, 2023, with a closing of July 12, 2023, at 02:00 PM EDT. Bidders are advised that the amendment closes on August 11, 2023, at 02:00 PM EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Tender Description ##

The successful supplier will be responsible for providing building automation systems (BAS) installation, repairs, and maintenance services on an “as and when required basis” for the Canadian Armed Forces in Manitoba. The services will include skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials as required by National Defence (DND).

#### Key Details ##

* **Procurement Category**: Construction and Maintenance
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User**: Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Contact Information ##

Christopher Lau, procurement representative, can be reached at christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Additional Information ##

The solicitation document is available through Ariba Discovery, and all bidders are required to submit their proposals through this platform.
